sentences.en: A man is well or woe as he thinks himself so.
sentences.cn: 自认祸是祸,自认福是福.

sentences.en: And at this fresh woe , she broke into renewed outcries.
sentences.cn: 想起这段伤心事, 她又放声痛哭起来.

sentences.en: He listened to my tale of woe.
sentences.cn: 他听我诉说悲伤的故事。

sentences.en: He paused, for Stener's face had become a jelly - like mass of woe.
sentences.cn: 他停顿了一下, 因为斯坦纳的面上堆起了一层愁苦的神色.

sentences.en: He was constantly regaled with tales of woe.
sentences.cn: 别人老是给他讲些倒霉事儿来逗他开心。

sentences.en: He was faithful to me in weal and woe.
sentences.cn: 不管是在顺境或是在逆境,他一直对我忠诚.

sentences.en: Kinsman helps kinsman, but woe to him that hath nothing.
sentences.cn: 亲人帮亲人, 无亲愁煞人.

sentences.en: Mary's life was full of woe.
sentences.cn: 玛丽的生活充满着悲哀.

sentences.en: Surely , surely, we have ransomed one another, with all this woe!
sentences.cn: 确确实实, 我们已经用这一切悲苦彼此赎救了!

sentences.en: The ox is never woe , till he to the harrow go.
They maintain the closest relations with the masses and share their weal and woe.
sentences.cn: 他们和群众血肉相连,休戚与共.

sentences.en: woe betide anyone wearing the wrong colour!.
sentences.cn: 穿错颜色的人将要倒霉！。

sentences.en: Woe betide anyone who got in his way.
Woe betide you if you betray us.
sentences.cn: 如果你背叛我们,你会得到报应.

sentences.en: Woe to the man who played tricks with that Army, or got undeserved promotion in it!
sentences.cn: 跟那支部队玩花头或是在其中得到非分提拔的人要倒霉了!

words.tran_cn: 悲哀的；悲惨的；遗憾的；不幸的
悲伤地；不幸地；使人痛苦地
唉（表示痛苦，悲伤或悔恨）

phrases.phrase: woe betide someone (或 woe to someone)
phrases.tran_cn: ( 幽默)某人将要倒霉（或遭殃）

trans.tran_cn: 唉（表示痛苦，悲伤或悔恨）
悲哀，悲伤，灾难，灾殃，苦恼
